qas.question: A BIOS chip is located where in a computer?
What type of software is stored in a BIOS chip?

context: Firmware is the technology which has the combination of both hardware and software such as BIOS chip inside a computer. This chip (hardware) is located on <a0_0>the motherboard<a0_0/> and has the <a1_0>BIOS set up<a1_0/> (software) stored in it.
